title: Sept 19 Cant connect to pvp server error
body:
so i was playing just fine during the night and this morning then logged off to eat and watch a tv show came back to play and havent been able to login says i cant connect to the pvp server everytime i dont get it. I downloaded this hextech repair tool did it twice reinstalled the last patch and same thing its useless i dunno what to do someone plz help!
EDIT!!
K so i reinstalled the whole game still same issue my region is NA obv canada vancouver B.C. Isp is Telus
RE Edit 
K so now i can get in but still dont have the icon sigh:(

replies.body: It sounds like you're having a network issue that's having problems connecting to the server, so a repair won't necessarily fix this since it just works on game files.  I suggest following our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hey man, I have the same problem. a rioter has at least responded to it in this post: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/LTBd3M2x-i-cant-log-on-to-league-of-legends-please-help-me
no solution yet though as far as I know
i was also playing early this morning and left for like 2 hours and mysteriously cannot connect to server as well
